name: FlyingUnderTheWeather
description:
Flying under the Weather

This was made for the Curdle Jam with the Theme UNDER THE WEATHER.

The Goal of the Game is to Guide the Planes to their Destination, without flying through or under the Weather. To do this you can select a Plane by LEFT CLICKING it. Its Destination will be highlighted in Red. By RIGHT CLICKING you place Waypoints for it. After klicking the Play Button at the Bottom each Plane will Fly towards their Waypoints.

To Hide the Weather Features like the Clouds etc. you have to click the Botton "Weather" on the bottom left and to Hide all not selected Planes you have to click "Planes".

The Bottom on the Right is for Speeding up the Speed of the game.

Credits:

Brainstorming/ helping with ideas:  Benny, Nico, Daniel, Emil

Programming:  Benny, Daniel

Art:  Nico, Benny

Making Bad Jokes while Working:  Daniel, Benny, Nico, Emil
